NO:
A family of entrepreneurs, Hammie, Hamnett and August Hill
founded ZeroKnowledge (now Radialpoint) and sold to AppDirect last year.
Today, the Hills are invested in industries such as sustainable foods, bitcoin, and communications. Hamnett is rocking the CEO role at Smooch.

MIKE GOZZO:
This is Mike giving a talk at ProductTank
![Mike](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmoochMediaBot/SmoochMediaBot/master/img/Mike%20Gozzo.png)
Mike is a trained electrical engineer and MBA. He built and sold Appifier in 2014 before spearheading Smooch.
He also loves to run and cook. Been named one of Quebec's top 25 emerging entrepreneurs.

HAMNETT HILL:
Hamnett is an IT communications veteran and entrepreneur. He founded, lead and sold TotalNet and Zero Knowledge (now Radial Point). Asides from leading Smooch, Hamnett runs a private equity fund focused in sustain foods.
